Datasets and code for the “Cortical and subcortical connections change after repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation therapy in cocaine use disorder and predict clinical outcome” analysis.

Please let us know if something in the code is incomplete or files are missing or you have any problems by here or in:

jalil.rasgadoto@gmail.com and/or victorissa.93@gmail.com

# Study description 

The examination of the changes in NODDI values after rTMS therapy over a Cocaine Substance Use, as well as tested predictions of these over the craving and impulsiveness state.

# Data

BIDS compliant raw MRI data are available at OpenNeuro: https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds003037/versions/1.0.1
